dialogueSequence.sentence: And over yonder hill lies Yaltress, the capital.
Master always hated the capital, said it was full of a bunch of schmucks who played at magic.
Woof (He also tried to kill us)
My master was kicked out of every inn in town for weaving a tale too lascivious for man and god.
Bark Bork (Your master was also a mildly philosophical drunk.)
(Why does dad want to assimilate this world anyways?
(They’ve done nothing but exist peacefully. And I’ve been slaughtering them at every turn.
